menu

Class Game

  • java.lang.Object
    • menu.Game
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Created by Nicolas on 21/06/2017. main class which control the others class implements Runnable for use Thread
